body:
In this game, players post on this topic what game they would want to see added and played on the Avicus Network!

A few rules before you begin:
1. Try to minimise copying
2. Be nice and supportive

I would personally add a few more survival based mini-games like survival or factions that way those who don't personally like the PvP combat or a just not that skilled in it but are skilled in survival now have that option and have a reason to stay on Avicus.

Good luck!
- Sheamus
